mapper.select: /* AlimtalkSendHistMapper.getAlimtalkAddresseeDtlList */ SELECT A.PHONE_NUMBER, B.ADDR, B.SALE_DATE FROM --알림톡 전송 팝업 ( SELECT * FROM ( ( --알림톡 SELECT SBPENC.D(A.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_SEND_ENC A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) UNION ALL ( --알림톡 문자 전송결과 SELECT SBPENC.D(A.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_REPORT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) ) ) A, --마케팅용 알림톡전송 ( SELECT SBPENC.D(sssemr.TEL_NO) AS PHONE_NUMBER, (sssemr.ADDR || ' ' || sssemr.ADDR_DTL) AS ADDR, sssemr.SALE_DATE FROM TB_AL_ALIMTALK_SEND_ENC_MEMBER_READY sssemr WHERE 1=1 AND sssemr.ALK_SEND_SEQ = #{alkSendSeq} ) B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PHONE_NUMBER (+)= A.PHONE_NUMBER
